items.sentence: Tom said everyone he knows has been to Boston.
Tom told me he thought Boston was a safe city.
Tom thinks that Mary is pretty good at French.
Tom said that he wasn't a good French speaker.
Tom said that he wanted to improve his French.
Tom said that he may not study French anymore.
I don't think Tom will be in Boston next week.
I think you shouldn't have done that with Tom.
I didn't think that we needed to wait for Tom.
I think that Tom should learn to speak French.
